desc: 3 contract jobs, 2 production-level open source projects, while tutoring 1 junior developer.
Led a team that helped dozens of overseas companies to successfully acquire for import licenses for food and recyclable materials from Chinese government authorities.

Oversaw and facilitated the selection, signing, localization, technical integration, and operation processes of the introduction of several Chinese games into the European market, with the one title (Light of Darkness) I was most closely involved having grossed over half a million USD.
